Terms of Service

Last Updated: December 29, 2025

1. Agreement to Terms

By accessing or using QR Studio (qr-generator.cc), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service. Our tools are provided as-is for the benefit of our users.

2. Description of Service

QR Studio is an online tool service providing various QR code generation utilities. Our service allows users to generate static QR codes for personal and commercial use without the need for registration or server-side data processing.

3. User Conduct and License

We grant you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use our QR code generators. You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes. While our tools are free for both personal and commercial projects, you may not:

  • Use the service to generate QR codes containing illegal, harmful, or malicious content.
  • Attempt to reverse engineer or disrupt the technical infrastructure of the site.
  • Automate the use of the site via scripts or bots without prior written consent.

4. Intellectual Property

The content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of QR Studio or its content suppliers and protected by international copyright laws. The resulting QR code images generated by you are your property to use as you see fit.

5. Disclaimer of Warranties

The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. QR Studio makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding the reliability or availability of the service. We do not guarantee that the QR codes generated will be compatible with all scanning hardware or software, although we follow standard protocols.

6. Limitation of Liability

In no event shall QR Studio, its creators, or its affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of the use or inability to use the service, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.

7. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Your continued use of the site following any changes signifies your acceptance of the new terms.

8. Contact

Questions about the Terms of Service should be sent to us at contact@qr-generator.cc.
